Author: Mihailo#5902
Content: This is basically 13 bytes, so I think your final hex should be `0d0084f4c41204120544f444f5321`

Author: Mihailo#5902
Content: 25 chars long hex needs 13 bytes (26 chars long hex) to store it

Author: Mihailo#5902
Content:
@siu - Chainmakers use this to convert string to hex string:
```
printf TestString | xxd -ps
```

Author: Mihailo#5902
Content: or echo -n

Author: Mihailo#5902
Content: As echo adds implicit newline

Author: Mihailo#5902
Content: Then calculate length and convert to hex in calculator
